titleStmt.title: The bokes of Salomon namely, Prouerbia Ecclesiastes Cantica canticorum. Sapientia. Ecclesiasticus or Iesus the sonne of Syrach
Bible. O.T. Hagiographa. English. Great Bible. Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules churcheyarde at the sygne of the Kinges armes by [N. Hill for] Wylliam Bonham],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon. Actual printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio, ad imprimendum solum.
Title page border (McKerrow & Ferguson 33) has initials "N.H." in slot in sill--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sygne of the Kinges armes
